alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:44AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Rockingham and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1144 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Merrimack, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Derry, Merrimack, Bedford, Hooksett, Amherst, Litchfield, Hollis, Epping, Brentwood, Mont Vernon, Raymond, Mount Vernon, Goffstown, Londonderry, Hampstead, Kingston, Chester, Danville and Fremont. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 8. Interstate 93 between mile markers 11 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Western And Central Hillsborough
